block.p: Lisa Ann Lewandowski, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Leonard Lewandowski of Carlstadt, N.J., was married yesterday to Ronald Milton Schneider Jr., a son of Anita L. Schneider of Ridgewood, N.J., and Dr. Schneider of Port Jefferson, N.Y. The Rev. Thomas Kelly performed the ceremony at Our Lady of the Assumption Church in Wood-Ridge, N.J.

Mrs. Schneider, 39, is an assistant treasurer for electronic banking at the Bank of New York. She graduated from Seton Hall University. Her father retired as a purchasing manager at the Thomas J. Lipton Company in Englewood Cliffs, N.J.

Lisa Ann Lewandowski, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Leonard Lewandowski of Carlstadt, N.J., was married yesterday to Ronald Milton Schneider Jr., a son of Anita L. Schneider of Ridgewood, N.J., and Dr. Schneider of Port Jefferson, N.Y. The Rev. Thomas Kelly performed the ceremony at Our Lady of the Assumption Church in Wood-Ridge, N.J.

Mrs. Schneider, 39, is an assistant treasurer for electronic banking at the Bank of New York. She graduated from Seton Hall University. Her father retired as a purchasing manager at the Thomas J. Lipton Company in Englewood Cliffs, N.J.

Mr. Schneider, 45, is a senior analyst and consultant in Manhattan at ChaseMellon Shareholder Services, which advises companies on shareholder proxy issues and mergers and acquisitions. He graduated from Princeton. His mother, who is retired, was the director of the media center at Ridgewood High School. His father is a professor of political science at Queens College.
